greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of iterations of x -> x + A064834(x) to reach a palindrome, starting with n (or -1 if no palindrome is ever reached).
comment: Longest sequence for n<252784 is a(250584)=2311. Is a palindromic number always reached?
example: For n=16, A064834(16) = 5, so next number is 16+5 = 21. A064834(21)=1 so next number is 22. 22 is a palindrome which is reached after 2 iterations, so a(16)=2
results.author: Jonathan Ayres (jonathan.ayres(AT)btinternet.com), Oct 25 2001
